response.overview: A tale of a worried father who hires a filmmaking crew to document the travails of his son and his sons friend. The boys are a pair of untalented musicians attempting to break into the world of hip-hop. Guard Lyc and Li'l Young, are unaware of how bad their talents are, and they work to impress their mentor, KRS-One. As the crew follows the pair, they capture a unique look at L.A.'s hip-hop scene.
response.tagline: The Underdogs of Hip-Hop Have Their Day
response.title: This Is Primal Rap
